我又返黎啦
2016 2017 2018都開過同名POST
今年已經係第四年開

講下背景先啦

小弟三大CHEM major grad
之前全職做左六年補習社CHEM老師
上年開始脫離補習社 獨自租地方開班 / 私補教CHEM，黎緊第八年教DSE CHEM
考過2013-2018六屆DSE CHEM全5** (2012無報考)
睇返HKEA report 全香港現時得我一個痴線佬考左咁多次5**返黎

當然天外有天 絕對唔敢話勁過其他人
只係自問叫做有小小研究 小小經驗同心得可以分享下

所以上年開始 我整左個youtube channel 主力拍DSE題目詳解
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPE9pbWdjviOfSWRn9V2kRQ
等大家可以方便自學 最緊要唔洗錢

為左令大家睇得舒服 個channel亦特登唔落廣告(我係一毫子都無喺youtube賺過)
睇過覺得好既 請subscribe & 介紹比朋友
有咩意見 覺得有咩地方要改善 都歡迎同我講

前排停左一段時間，黎緊新學年會開始拍新片
已收到2018份5**真跡卷 應該會拍左2018題解先
之後仲有咩主題想我拍既 隨時同我講 能力上OK既會儘量滿足大家

而呢個POST主要係for 2019 DSE同學問問題，一路陪大家直到考2019 CHEM
任何關於DSE CHEM既問題都可以問，我會儘量解答

不過請留意，太out syl 太離地果d野就最好唔好咁執著
好容易愈讀愈亂，考試大忌

之後我會不定時upload各類material比大家 e.g. 試題分析 精讀筆記 實戰策略...etc

有chem問題要聯絡我 / 提供意見，可隨時telegram我：https://t.me/elvislamchem

------------------------------
最後 想喺度多謝過去呢一年支持我既巴打絲打們

我信吸引力法則 當你真係有心做好一件事 其他有心既人自然會賞識你

其實有拍教學片同埋開班收生既idea 係當時受一部分準備retake既巴打們鼓勵
有d唔係搵我補習 但比左好多建議我 又幫我諗埋好多細節 甚至幫我搵埋地方
有d前兩年有追開POST 入埋U既巴打 主動送埋自己以前CHEM 5*/5**真跡比我

由上年9月開得成第一班 幾個retaker上堂 到之後慢慢有更多人加入 開夠幾班
有日校生 夜校生 甚至三大U grad / master grad 想考second degree既都有

而且大部分都好比心機讀 今年一堆成功入medic pharm 精算 OT

所以真係好感激有你地支持我
收唔收新生

replies.msg:
呢個係Avogadro's law (any gas under same condition 只要equal volume就會equal mole)

然後根據physics既ideal gas theory (pv=nrt)
1atm 298K下 1 mol gas既volume = 24dm3
不過為求方便 個數其實都係rounded up左

而且現實每種gas個molar volume會有輕微差異
要用實驗measure

Cl- -> 1/2Cl2 + aq + e- [+167.15]

(4) 直接加
Ag + 1/2Cl2 -> AgCl [-127.07]

(1)+(3)+(4) = [-105.56] + [+167.15] + [-127.07] = -65.48

你要分清楚個compare過程既logic flow先(當然chem個諗法同考試個諗法又可以有分別 )

一般係
1. structure(giant vs simple)
2. type of force (H bond vs vdw)
3. molecular size (H bond就睇avg no of H bond per molecule)
4. surface area
5. polarity

至於packing efficiency係melting point先會用(例如cis vs trans)
liquid由於無固定packing 所以睇intermolecular force就ok

replies.msg:
簡單解釋係 平時講既molecular size愈大boiling point愈高
更準確係指molecular size大 會令size of electron cloud around molecule變大
從而令molecule更容易被polarize 產生induced dipole
亦即係molecule間更易形成instantaneous dipole - induced dipole attraction (即係van der Waals' force) 令intermolecular force強度上升

雖然從molecular size上睇 N2係大過O2
但由於N2得兩個lone pair electron 而O2有四個lone pair electron
即係計size of electron cloud其實係O2大過N2
所以O2 boiling point反而會高少少

此回覆已被刪除

replies.msg:
general trend of atomic size黎講
across a period (左至右) size decrease
down a group (上至下) size increase
而Ar喺periodic table個位比O右兩格 但同時底一層
由於有兩個變項 overall size係大左定細左 無實質數據係好難準確估到 (實際上Ar > O)
而且要留意 雖然atomic size係Ar > O
但molecule黎計Ar係monoatomic 而O2係diatomic 所以更加難憑空判斷
如果DSE要出題目 佢一定會提供左個事實話比你知邊個bp高d先 丙叫佢解釋個事實

replies.msg:
yes 簡單講 system既energy change可用兩種方式表示：

1. Internal energy change內能變化 (dU) [DSE chem唔洗識]
-> heat change at constant volume (fixed V, 當有gas產生, system pressure會上升)
-> 由於fixed V所以work done會 = 0, 能量得返heat 種形式
-> heat change = Internal energy change

2. Enthalpy change焓變 (dH)
-> heat change at constant pressure (唔fix V, 當有gas產生, system volume會上升而pressure不變, 可諗成個reaction喺有活塞既容器內進行)
-> 由於(唔fix V所以gas會將活塞向外推, 有部分能量去左work done)
-> heat change + work done = enthalpy change

而因為work done對比overall heat change通常好細，加上大部分實驗通常喺constant pressure下進行(就咁一個發泡膠杯已經做得，次次要做close system / fixed volume好麻煩)，所以enthalpy change會係比較廣泛接受既指標

replies.msg:
closed system只代表物質唔可以進出 無話volume唔可以變
constant pressure一般係指空許個container expand volume
當system內gas volume increase(不論係reaction產生gas定exothermic process令system內既空氣expand)，會有work done by system to surroundings令活塞向外推
最後令system pressure同外界既pressure相等，亦即係樓上提過既唔fix V而fix P
至於你話neutralization既case 因為做實驗時唔會用太多既acid / alkali (因為最後都係計kJ mol-1 用多都無意義) 放出既熱通常唔多 air expand造成既work done好有限 正路都會忽略

standard condition係指environment
但reactant本身都要standard state (即係C要graphite / O要O2)

replies.msg:
From the perspective of entropy, the first one will be favoured because of less decrease in entropy(disorder)
From the thermodynamic perspective, S=O bond strength should be weaker than O=O bond strength, so it is less likely that 3 S=O will be present in the same molecule,although the additional resonance stabilisation effect may be taken into account for SO3.
If the reaction is a single step reaction, then it is probably kinetically unlikely that 5 molecules from the reactant side will collide with each other to form the desired products.
However, kinetic control and thermodynamic control may help us achieve selectivity between the two pathways by tuning the temperature of interest which affects the reversibility of the reaction.

如果我考緊midterm會咁答，有d嘢無absolute answer，只係得reasonable answer，姐係合理地吹都可以，直到你去做實驗confirm。

利申：大學organic chem /inorganic chem A+ DSE chem 5**

S(s) + O2(g) = SO2(g)
2S(s) + 3O2(g) = 2SO3(g)

Which one is more likely to occur?
From the perspective of entropy, the first one will be favoured because of less decrease in entropy(disorder)
From the thermodynamic perspective, S=O bond strength should be weaker than O=O bond strength, so it is less likely that 3 S=O will be present in the same molecule,although the additional resonance stabilisation effect may be taken into account for SO3.
If the reaction is a single step reaction, then it is probably kinetically unlikely that 5 molecules from the reactant side will collide with each other to form the desired products.
However, kinetic control and thermodynamic control may help us achieve selectivity between the two pathways by tuning the temperature of interest which affects the reversibility of the reaction.

如果我考緊midterm會咁答，有d嘢無absolute answer，只係得reasonable answer，姐係合理地吹都可以，直到你去做實驗confirm。

利申：大學organic chem /inorganic chem A+ DSE chem 5**


呢句真 可以係好多個原因都關事 睇你考緊邊科囉 但邊個factor影響最大真係做過實驗先會知
不過DSE會學既幾乎都係概定事實 possible ans少又係真既

replies.msg:
reactant
呢個我自己都求證左一段時間(唔關知識事 關點define事) 亦都同過唔同日校老師/博士朋友s/一個幾出名既同行討論過

結論係 以前9x年 特別係CE時期 會教學生當alkaline hydrolysis係OH- catalyze 然後出黎個RCOOH再neutralization出RCOO-Na+
但其實嚴格黎講係錯的(事實上CE好多簡化左既內容其實背後都係錯)

以下係解釋個mechanism 儘量簡單 量力而為：
睇返個mechanism OH-撞左埋個R1COOR2度之後係甩-OR2再即時protonate返做HOR2同埋R1COO- 個OH-的確係consume左無regenerate返
呢個同acid hydrolysis好唔同 因為acid hydrolysis真係會甩返個H+出黎

而實際上好多大學level既書都改返base hydrolysis做base-promoted / base-induced hydrolysis 亦表明左同acid-catalyzed hydrolysis分割開咁睇

好嚴格黎講 其實加acid做先乎合hydrolysis既基本定義(加H2O & break down)
加alkali其實係涉及ester同OH-之間既反應 用hydrolysis形容唔係太準確
但由於acid / alkali兩個做法上好似 所以約定俗成地兩個都叫做hydrolysis 特別係中學level

而依家DSE年代好樣野好過CE 就係內容上非常政治正確 背後background knowledge一定會啱先出題

事實上DSE 2013 MCQ32都有問過alkaline hydrolysis of amide (mechanism同ester一樣)
答案都表明左alkali唔係catalyst

因為acid / alkali hydrolysis主要係研究佢個mechanism 有無做calatyst呢個位反而唔係重點 所以好多書都講得好曖昧 或無特別提呢d野

基於呢個定義下 base hydrolysis過程中其實係無H2O直接參與

benzene屬於aromatic compound(芳香族)
alkane alkene alkyne果d叫aliphatic compound(脂肪族)

由於benzene唔屬於alkene 兩者行既反應唔一樣

至於DSE黎講屬然無學過benzene既details
但基本要知道
1. 佢唔係alkene (無alkene reactions)
2. 佢好stable (個ring一般唔會拆散)
3. 直接連在benzene上既atom 通常都甩唔到 (or好難甩)

quote.msg:

conc sul 係organic reaction 係咩角色

一時dehydrating agent
一時catalyst

replies.msg:
兩樣都有
兩個function係獨立睇
以esterification黎講
H+先係真正既catalyst
理論上用其他acid去provide H+都無所謂

而conc H2SO4自帶dehydrating property
可以remove water from mixture
令esterification既equilibrium shift RHS 從而令ester既yield increase
呢個算係H2SO4 specific既功能 同catalyst分開

即係話假如你用其他acid做
會有catalytic effect (H+)
但唔會increase yield

replies.msg:
呢個係本書無講清楚
首先 H+ = OH- 係neutral真正既definition
pH = 7 只係25 oC下既neutral
當溫度改變 neutral pH就唔係7

而要答你個問題 首先要知道：

H2O <-> H+ + OH- (self ionization of water)
at 25 oC, Kc = [H+][OH-] = 1 x 10^-14

根據Kc既特性 只要T unchange, Kc都會unchange
而neutral時, [H+]=[OH-]=1x10^-7
當你pH=8,即係[H+]=1x10^-8
咁Kc=[1x10^-8][OH-]=1x10^-14
即係[OH-]=1x10^-6
所以H+ < OH- (alkaline)

簡單講
25 oC時你講既 [H+] = [ OH-] = 10^-8係不存在的
[H+]同[OH-]既關係係此消彼長

除非T唔係25 oC, 例如T increase
到時reaction會shift RHS, Kc會>1 x 10^-14
咁就可以出現[H+] = [ OH-] = 10^-8
而其實咁樣都係neutral
事實上唔同溫度下對應既neutral pH都唔同
熱水pH < 7, 冷水pH > 7
但佢地仍然係 [H+] = [ OH-] 所以仍然定義為neutral

呢段題解有詳細講：
https://youtu.be/mm86Mh2rW3M

—————
用兩條different reactivity既metal係為左有potential difference 導致more reactive metal會自發將electron release去less reactive metal度
(可以諗成rusting時學既sacrificial protection)
如果改用inert electrode 咁就要靠其他物質產生potential difference
例如兩個half cell 一邊放KMnO4 另一邊放KI
等兩邊electrolyte做redox

至於你講個case 個electrolyte用咩先係重點 因為Cu無參與reaction 你用C/Pt都ok 但唔好用高過Mg既metal

quote.msg: 此回覆已被刪除

replies.msg:
攪清楚先
我地依家既認知範疇 係acid既properties黎自H+ ion
acid要先溶落水ionize出H+ 先可以進行neutralization等reaction

至於HCl(g)同NH3(g)直接react出NH4Cl(s)
無錯化學上黎講呢個廣泛認同係neutralization

不過因為acid/base/neutralization其實有幾種唔同定義 而唔同場合/程度下 用既定義都唔一樣

我地中學用緊H+ OH-既定義叫做Arrhenius acid base theory(亞列紐斯酸鹼學說) 亦係初階化學最常用既定義

但化學上其實有好多情況係無水既環境做應 或者無涉及ionize H+ / OH-
但基於其他定義方法下 都可以稱為acid/base/neutralization

例如你講既HCl(g) + NH3(g) -> NH4Cl(s)
其實會用另一種叫Brønsted-Lowry acid base theory(布倫斯特路理酸鹼學說)既定義
呢個學說將acid / base定義為proton donor and acceptor 而not necessary involve ionization
所以嚴格黎講呢個reaction都係neutralization

最重要既問題係 DSE只係學最基礎既定義方法(Arrhenius, H+ OH-) 所以HCl(g) + NH3(g) -> NH4Cl(s)現階段係唔算neutralization的

不過留意HCl(aq) + NH3(aq) -> NH4Cl(aq)時就有涉及ionization in water 咁就可以用返Arrhenius definition 定義為neutralization

AL chem時代係有學曬幾種定義方法 以前AL試題都會講明叫你用邊種定義去答題

而現時DSE講明只用H+ + OH- -> H2O定義


佢寫到咁明 其實就係唔想考生喺定義上混亂
同埋避免d老師on 99懶係勁教埋d深野fake 9學生

考試最緊要知道syllabus點定義 唔好諗住愈深愈好
你可以識深既野 但同時要知考試邊d要用邊d唔用

特別係化學 唔同階段你d知識既定義同邏輯都唔同
例如electron arrangement用2,8,8定1s 2s 2p咁

replies.msg:
佢溶acid果時係做neutralization
當你落個solid係excess時 有剩既solid如果唔溶水
一般會assume佢唔吸熱而neglect左佢(個solid本身mass都唔會多)

而如果隻solid本身soluble 就算excess左都會溶埋 咁變左你除左係measure緊neutralization之外 仲會計埋enthalpy of solution(of excess soluble solid)

呢個再講落去其實會同你實驗做緊邊種enthalpy有關 因為有d實驗prefer solid用excess(e.g. displacement) 而有d實驗prefer solid用limiting(e.g. solution)

再加上計定唔計其實本身就好睇你學個程度同範疇 無一個非常劃一既standard

DSE 2012 & 2013出兩次LQ都係直接比左個final mass of mixture你 避免再出現計定唔計既問題
而DSE 2014開始更加直接cut左enthalpy of solution

所以我個人唔太認為要擔心呢樣野

假如Kc>Qc，咁代表forward reaction rate 大過backward reaction rate？但呢個唔係應該係已發生嘅情況，咁當下個一刻嘅backward reaction rate唔係應該大過 forward reaction rate？

replies.msg:
Qc係用黎判斷你果一刻個system發生緊既情況
即係個system距離attain equilibrium既程度同趨向

如果發現某一刻Kc > Qc 即係system仲未attain eqm，而佢正向attain eqm呢個目標進發緊(Qc -> Kc)

而要attain eqm個Qc將要變大 即係product increase而reactant decrease(RHS) 表示forward rate > backward rate

如果你果刻係Kc > Qc 咁Qc會隨時間慢慢increase直至Kc = Qc
換句話說 即係forward rate一路增加 backward rate一路減小 直至最後forward rate = backward rate

quote.msg:
想問 salt 係唔係一定係pH7?
如果係 strong acid mix weak base or weak acid mix strong base
會唔會出 acidic salt and alkaline salt？

replies.msg:
Neutral =/= ph=7

pH7係常溫25度常壓下既neutral

其他溫度壓強下既neutral 可以pH>/< 7

所以salt唔一定pH7

quote.msg:
想問 salt 係唔係一定係pH7?
如果係 strong acid mix weak base or weak acid mix strong base
會唔會出 acidic salt and alkaline salt？

replies.msg:
唔一定 因為有d ion會影響pH
例如CO32-/HCO3-/RCOO-都係slightly alkaline
NH4+就acidic

不過以DSE level黎講 佢唔係好酸or好鹼就唔洗點理

如果你話strong acid + weak base (or相反)
出黎既salt會slightly acidic / alkaline
亦因爲咁 titration最後既end point未必等於pH 7

—————
以下為out syl內容
主要原因係weak acid neutralization 後既salt (又稱conjugated base共軛鹼)係slightly alkaline
weak base neutralization 後既salt (又稱conjugated acid 共軛酸)係slightly acidic

例如
HCl + NH3 -> NH4Cl
NH4+ <-> NH3 + H+
放出H+ slightly acidic

CH3COOH + NaOH -> CH3COONa
CH3COO- + H+ <-> CH3COOH
吸收H+ slightly alkaline

淨係計energy density of hydrocarbons(唔計combustion所需既O2 mass)
通常少d C既CxHy energy density會高d
如果有埋O 即係CxHyOz果d 就會無一個consistent既正比關係
而且一隻fuel唔係睇energy density咁簡單
仲要考慮咩佢要用幾多oxidizing agent (最common係O2)
易唔易complete combustion (唔complete會釋放唔曬能量)
octane value辛烷值 (anti knocking)
當然仲有cost
所以你無實際數據既話唔好亂估
一係諗下storage / safety / pollution呢幾方面比較明確d既方向

我想請問咩叫each homologous series differ from next by —CH2— group
同埋第2句唔係好明 thanks

replies.msg:
即係以一個homologous series黎計
e.g. alkane
佢既member跟C數量小至大排序係
CH4>CH3CH3>CH3CH2CH3>CH3CH2CH2CH3...
每個member都相差一個-CH2- unit
令條carbon chain長左同molecular size大左
所以會有gradual change in physical properties
例如boiling point increase, solubility in water decrease, viscosity increase

第二句講 你係咩series 要睇返你講緊邊類compound 例如C=C就alkene COOH就 carboxylic acid
但有時一個compound可以同時有好幾個functional group 咁就要根據返佢成個compound overall去決定佢屬於咩series
但一個compound唔會同時fit into兩個homologous series

加一定量S2O32-係為左同reaction initial產生既I2 react

題目係acid-base titration 冇比實數 淨係話small portions of acid successively added
係咪當form出黎既h2o唔導電？

replies.msg:
當你一路add acid to alkaline直到剛好equivalence point (all H+ OH- reacted to give H2O) 相比你過左equivalence point繼續add excess acid 個total concentration of mobile ion會上升 咁你就會見到個明顯既轉角位
另一個原因係H+ / OH-外既ion 對conductivity既contribution係會低d
所以for左H2O後 雖然有其餘ion喺mixture 但都會睇到conductivity跌 只係無BaSO4(s)果d case咁明顯
